public void declareActorType(java.lang.String type)
Prepares the model to manage actors of the specified type.

Parameters:
type - the actor type.

addActionLayer

public void addActionLayer(APSEActionLayer layer,
                           java.lang.String identifier)
Adds an action layer to the model.

Parameters:
layer - the layer to add.
identifier - a unique identifier for the layer.

addDefaultLayerForActorType

public void addDefaultLayerForActorType(java.lang.String type,
                                        java.lang.String layer)
Adds a default layer for a specified actor type.

Parameters:
type - the actor type.
layer - the layer identifier.

insertActor

public void insertActor(APSEActor actor)
Inserts an actor into the model. Actors are not inserted until the next update iteration.

Parameters:
actor - the actor to insert.

getActorsOfType

public java.util.List<APSEActor> getActorsOfType(java.lang.String type)
Returns all actors of a specified type.

Parameters:
type - the actor type.
Returns:
the set of actors.

getModelDelegate

public APSEModelDelegate getModelDelegate()
Returns the delegate to the model.

Returns:
the model delegate.

update

public void update()
Updates the simulation model. (1) First, flagged actors are removed. (2) Next, inserted actors are loaded into the model. (3) Next, interactions between actors are facilitated. (4) Finally, the actors are updated.
